location: Zhongcheng Road Section 1, Shilin District, near Dexing Zhongcheng Road Station (79m) and Lanya New City Station (105m)
notes: Newly renovated 4BR/2BA unit described as high-end with strong natural light. Has two balconies (check railing height for baby safety), elevator building good for stroller access. No pets allowed; cooking permitted with natural gas. Agent-listed property with negotiable deposit and NT$1000/month management fee.
